channel.title: git on jherrlin
channel.description: Recent content in git on jherrlin

item.title: Emacs, GnuPG and Pass
item.description: Intro This post is the first out of two about GnuPG, password management, email, signing and encrypting emails and git commit signing. As always with a helping hand from Emacs. As the posts cover a lot of ground step by step instructions are not desirable. Links to more detailed resources can be found in each section. The main goal is to provide a quick but informative overview and give inspiration for further research.
